sections.title: HdRezkaSearch
sections.description: Entry point for search. Create an instance with site origin and call it as a function.

items.title: search(query, find_all=False)
items.description: Performs search. Returns either a fast result list or full paginated results.

items.title: All pages
items.code:
from HdRezkaApi import HdRezkaSearch

results = HdRezkaSearch('https://hdrezka.ag/')('Шерлок', find_all=True)
print(results.all_pages)

items.title: Flatten results

from HdRezkaApi import HdRezkaSearch

results = HdRezkaSearch('https://hdrezka.ag/')('Шерлок', find_all=True)
print(results.all)

items.title: Specific page
items.code:
from HdRezkaApi import HdRezkaSearch

results = HdRezkaSearch('https://hdrezka.ag/')('Шерлок', find_all=True)
print(results.get_page(2)) # page number
# or
print(results[1]) # index

items.title: Fast search
items.code:
with HdRezkaSession('https://rezka_mirror.com/') as session:
    results = session.search('film name')
